```{r indices,results="asis",echo=FALSE}
biom <- read.csv("data/Indices.csv",header=T,as.is=TRUE,na.strings=" ")

t3  <- biom
for (i in 2:length(t3[1,])) {
      t3[,i]   <- formatC(t3[,i], format="d", big.mark=",",digits=0) 
}
cap <- tabcap[14]
lab <- paste0("tab:",tablab[14])
tab <- xtable(t3, caption = cap, label=lab,digits=0, auto=TRUE, align=rep("r",(length(t3[1,])+1)) )
print(tab, caption.placement = "top",include.rownames = FALSE, sanitize.text.function = function(x){x}, scalebox=.90)
```
